title: Bug 47158I think AccessLogValve has race condition problem
description: Bug 47158I think AccessLogValve has race condition problem "DoubleChecked Locking" pattern is heavily used in this class, but the usage of it in AccessLogValve has some issues of race condition judging by this article: http://www.cs.umd.edu/~pugh/java/memoryModel/DoubleCheckedLocking.htmlBased by this article, I think these variables in this class should be declared as volatile to get rid of race condition:private volatile long currentMillis;private volatileDate currentDate;
